product_name: Prism Designs Snapshot 1.2 Power Foil Kite
long_description: Pack radical aerial thrills into your glove box, handbag or backpack with the compact Snap Shot 1.2 from Prism. Fast, maneuverable design offers an ideal introduction to the joy of dual-line power kites. Meticulously crafted intakes prevent the kite from collapsing in gusty wind. Elliptical platform reduces drag for amazing speed and acceleration. Includes kite, dual lines, wrist straps, tail, winder, instructions and carry pouch.
short_description: Pack radical aerial thrills into your glove box, handbag or backpack with the compact Snap Shot 1.2 from Prism.
